nodes.text: Healing amulets were magical devices that allowed Sith warriors to heal themselves through the Force while in the heat of battle. Created by pureblooded members of the Sith species, these amulets stimulated the physical body's natural healing processes, at the expense of the individual's ability to manipulate the Force. The Sith sorcerer Rin Shuuir possessed such an amulet which he used to heal the Sith warrior Utris.
